flawed_nl_solution:
The bus started with 50 people - 15 who got off at the first stop = <<50-15=35>>35 people on the bus.
At the second stop, 35 people on the bus - 8 who got off = <<35-8=27>>27 people.
Then there were 27 people + 2 who got on = <<27+2=28>>28 people on the bus.
At the third stop, 28 people on the bus - 4 who got off = <<28-4=24>>24 people on the bus.
Then there were 24 people on the bus + 3 who got on = <<24+3=27>>27 people on the bus.
#### 27

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 29, not 28. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
